name: Xdcc4j
tagline: XDCC Web-based java downloader from IRC server
body:
### Welcome to Xdcc4j.
This project offers an extendible REST API and a simple GUI to manage the search and the downloads from a XDCC Bot providing files on an IRC server.
The project is modular and there is a simple web GUI that show how you can use the REST API. 


### Rest Service
The base facade is the XdccDownloaderService interface. All methods exposed in this interface provide high level operations to manage:
 - searching
 - caching
 - start of a file transfer
 - cancel of a file transfer
 - check server connectivity
 - listing of user and channels

### WEB GUI
The xdcc-ui module provide a simple web GUI showing how you can use high level interface.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Xdcc4j? I'm working for documentation and some utils test case. Please be patient or contact bifulcoluigi@gmail.com for every questions, comments or doubts. Issue page is a good starting point ;).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
